headline: Becton, Dickinson and Company (BDX): A Healthcare Leader Among Cheap Dividend Stocks
summary: Becton, Dickinson and Company (NYSE:BDX) is included among the 13 Incredibly Cheap Dividend Stocks to Invest in. Becton, Dickinson and Company (NYSE:BDX), which positions itself as a medical technology company, is currently undergoing a turnaround. The business has faced challenges in recent years, including several strategic missteps and a large product recall. More recently, Becton, […]
